name: Martyn Coomber
title: ook my car to Malvern Auto Services as it is a Bosch Service Centre and they have high service standards. They are also located close to a train station.

name: Sahara Anderson
title: Darren was very helpful and i even had a call during the day to give me an update on my car with some advisory things that need looking at on my car

name: Kym Anderson
title: The team at Malvern Auto Service fixed a significant fuel injector problem efficiently, kept the cost as low as possible and kept me informed with progress. Very professional, reliable and honest.

name: Christian Arevalo
title: The service was good, Jack always tried to help us in the best way possible. Definitely a place where you can take your car to be fixed.

name: Brayden Smith
title: ack and the team did a stellar job above and beyond expectations. Car is running better than it did from factory. Highly recommended A++

name: Christine Iwanoff
title: Thanks so much again, for another excellent service and very professional team. Mitch, Bill & Jack are always very happy to assist with any mechanical or electrical service.
